item.description:
This will be co-posted to Social Fun, Boston Euro Social, & Cambridge-somerville Live Music. We meet at 3:30. They'll regroup & meet us at 6 PM.

Join the mayhem.
Bewitching horns, music, & costume. Come along & see if you can stand still.
FORECAST LOOKS GOOD. There is no rain date. If it rains musicians will try to huddle in dry locations. There will be 30 bands-- FREE.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B2daMVvOpdQ

There will be six performers stageing areas.
http://honkfest.org/schedule/

At Sacco's, snatch a refreshment & introduce yourselves at the huge bar (with the bands it will be loud). Brass Bands end at 9:00.

If you want to stay with the Meetup, look for Tigger the Tiger, a tall hat float with a Tigger Tiger puppet.
Tip: for entertainment bring a light like a bike light, others will as well. Remember it will soon be dark.

HONK! fest ends at 9:00 PM.
We regroup at The Burren on Elm St. at 8:30 (Tigger Tiger hat float will be there). Beware, cover starts at 9:00.
OR --(option)--the Rosebud Bar & lounge which features two really good rock groups, $7 cover starts there (I think) at 8, music @ 9:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z9Hi4Z2dhe8
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qg3BanTuvEc
Burren: at 10:30 join the band Red Square (Boston-based) for dancing.
http://redsquareboston.com/

IF YOU WANT TO JOIN THIS MEETUP EVENT EARLIER, join Social Fun at Orleans at 3:30! Sign up with them.
item.how_to_find_us: look for the Tigger the Tiger hat float!
item.name: HONK! fest 2012! PLUS rock music, Dancing: Multi- meetups
